queries.query:
from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /.*System\.cpu$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used")
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "_measurement"])
  |> max()
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /.*System\.mem$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usedPercent")
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "_measurement"])
  |> max()
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /.*System\.cpu$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used")
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "_measurement"])
  |> mean()

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /.*System\.mem$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usedPercent")
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "_measurement"])
  |> mean()

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /System.cpu/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used")
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "_measurement"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /System.mem/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usedPercent")
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "_measurement"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)

spec.description: Dashboard to visualize metrics of a single Industrial Edge Device
spec.name: Metrics Industrial Edge
